item.title: Equilux a Arduino clock
item.description: I created a Arduino controled led clock with 60 rgb led’s. This one is inspired by the Equinox Clock from Bram Knaapen. LED strip For the 60 RGB leds I use a string of RGB leds that I order directly from China, each of those leds has a LPD6803 IC. A arduino library for this string can be found atÂ adafruit’s github. Time Keeping For time keeping I am using a a RTC DS1307 that is connected via I2C to pin A4 and A5 on the Arduino.
